images.copyright: Reticulated giraffe mother greeting calf, Lewa Wildlife Conservancy, Kenya (© Sean Crane/Minden Pictures)
images.title: Spot-on connection
images.caption: World Giraffe Day
images.desc: Today is about honoring the tallest creatures on Earth and highlighting the importance of conservation efforts. Giraffes have fascinated travelers from around the world for a long time. These animals were once viewed as status symbols and were treasured as pets among royalty.
